title: ranked loss from 2 Rage quiters, 1 afker and 1 intentional feeder
body:
i was playing a ranked game today and i was accused of not calling mia bot when clearly the anivia had saw that they were at drag and started to go off at me and start to feed the enemy bot lane and started to go on and verbally abuse me and the team and so that made the jax top go afk and eventually dc and made the support go and RQ (rage quit) then that made made our jungler go afk but not leave and she still continued to feed and rage at me just cause of 1 death and she would start a surrender and say surrender and report draven  

i really wish that i dont have that game counted as a loss as i was trying my best as i was in series for S3

replies.body: It's a shame that this still happens, but it's inevitable. Sometimes you just have to shrug it off and carry on.
